permafrost.tundra.tn.profile

Class ProfileCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.tn.profile.ProfileCache

  • public class ProfileCache
extends java.lang.Object
    A local in-memory cache of Trading Networks partner cache, to improve performance of Trading Networks processes, and to avoid thread-synchronization bottlenecks in the Trading Networks partner profile implementation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  ProfileCache.Holder
      Initialization on demand holder idiom.

    • Field Summary

      The local in-memory cache of Trading Networks partner profiles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Removes all Trading Networks partner profiles from the cache.
      com.wm.data.IData get(ProfileID id)
      Returns the Trading Networks partner profile associated with the given ID from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached (at which time it will be lazily cached).
      com.wm.data.IData get(ProfileID id, boolean refresh)
      Returns the Trading Networks partner profile associated with the given ID from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached or if a refresh is requested (at which time it will be lazily cached).
      com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String id)
      Returns the Trading Networks partner profile associated with the given internal ID from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached (at which time it will be lazily cached).
      com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String id, boolean refresh)
      Returns the Trading Networks partner profile associated with the given internal ID from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached or if a refresh is requested (at which time it will be lazily cached).
      com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String type)
      Returns the Trading Networks partner profile associated with the given external ID from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached (at which time it will be lazily cached).
      com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String type, boolean refresh)
      Returns the Trading Networks partner profile associated with the given external ID from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached or if a refresh is requested (at which time it will be lazily cached).

      Returns the singleton instance of this class.

      Returns a list of all the cached Trading Networks partner profiles.

      Returns a list of all the cached Trading Networks partner profiles, optionally seeded from the Trading Networks database.

      Returns a list of all the cached Trading Networks partner profiles, optionally seeded from the Trading Networks database.
      void refresh()
      Refreshes all Trading Networks partner profiles stored in the cache from the Trading Networks database.

      Seeds the cache with all partner profiles from the Trading Networks database.

      Seeds the cache with all partner profiles from the Trading Networks database.

      Returns the Trading Networks My Enterprise profile from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached (at which time it will be lazily cached).

      Returns the Trading Networks My Enterprise profile from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached or if a refresh is requested (at which time it will be lazily cached).

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
             throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Refreshes all Trading Networks partner profiles stored in the cache from the Trading Networks database.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all Trading Networks partner profiles from the cache.

      • seed

        public void seed()
          throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Seeds the cache with all partner profiles from the Trading Networks database.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs.

      • seed

        public void seed(boolean refresh)
          throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Seeds the cache with all partner profiles from the Trading Networks database.
        Parameters:
        refresh - If true, all profiles will be refreshed from the Trading Networks database, otherwise profiles already cached will remain unrefreshed.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs.

      • list

        public com.wm.data.IData[] list()
                         throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns a list of all the cached Trading Networks partner profiles.
        Returns:
        The list of all cached Trading Networks partner profiles.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

      • list

        public com.wm.data.IData[] list(boolean seed)
                         throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns a list of all the cached Trading Networks partner profiles, optionally seeded from the Trading Networks database.
        Parameters:
        seed - If true, the local cache will first be seeded with all Trading Networks partner profiles from the Trading Networks database.
        Returns:
        The list of all cached Trading Networks partner profiles.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

      • list

        public com.wm.data.IData[] list(boolean seed,
                                boolean refresh)
                         throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns a list of all the cached Trading Networks partner profiles, optionally seeded from the Trading Networks database.
        Parameters:
        seed - If true, the local cache will first be seeded with all Trading Networks partner profiles from the Trading Networks database.
        refresh - If true, all profiles will be refreshed from the Trading Networks database, otherwise profiles already cached will remain unrefreshed.
        Returns:
        The list of all cached Trading Networks partner profiles.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

      • get

        public com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String id)
                      throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the Trading Networks partner profile associated with the given internal ID from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached (at which time it will be lazily cached).
        Parameters:
        id - The internal ID associated with the partner profile to be returned.
        Returns:
        The partner profile associated with the given internal ID.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

      • get

        public com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String id,
                             boolean refresh)
                      throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the Trading Networks partner profile associated with the given internal ID from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached or if a refresh is requested (at which time it will be lazily cached).
        Parameters:
        id - The internal ID associated with the partner profile to be returned.
        refresh - If true, the partner profile is first reloaded from the Trading Networks database before being returned.
        Returns:
        The partner profile associated with the given internal ID.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

      • get

        public com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String id,
                             java.lang.String type)
                      throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the Trading Networks partner profile associated with the given external ID from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached (at which time it will be lazily cached).
        Parameters:
        id - The external ID associated with the profile to be returned.
        type - The type of external ID specified.
        Returns:
        The profile associated with the given external ID, or null if no profile exists with the given external ID.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

        public com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String id,

                             boolean refresh)

        Returns the Trading Networks partner profile associated with the given external ID from the cache if cached, or from the Trading Networks database if not cached or if a refresh is requested (at which time it will be lazily cached).
        Parameters:
        id - The external ID associated with the profile to be returned.
        type - The type of external ID specified.
        refresh - If true, the partner profile is first reloaded from the Trading Networks database before being returned.
        Returns:
        The profile associated with the given external ID, or null if no profile exists with the given external ID.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

      • self

        public com.wm.data.IData self()
                       throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException

        The Trading Networks My Enterprise profile.
        Throws:
